metadata.title: Kit: What type of microphones are supported by the solution kit?

sections.content:
Question:
What type of microphones are supported by the solution kit?
Answer:
The evaluation kit supports out of the box PDM mems microphones, analog microphones, and digital microphones with an I2S interface. The first two types are pre-assembled on the kit for easy evaluation, the latter is not mounted but a placeholder on the PCB is provided for user selection.
Suitable Products
RISC-V Voice ASSP
